column4: when i tried to remove gaim, it said i couldn't remove it because one or more programs depended on it
omg.  that's not *good

does anyone know of any security issues related to Gaim?  when i start Gaim, i have been getting spam messages addressed to various aliases i have used in my yahoo messenger in the past, which makes me think that someone has gained access to my yahoo messenger account.  also, i am experiencing connection slowdowns.  anybody have any insights?
that's why i tried to remove it
try to use firestarter
what's firestarter?
how do i get it?  can you tell me the command line, the ubuntu way?
what if it removes all those other files like it did to brownie?
i did sudo aptitude remove gaim, and it tells me 'nautilus sendto' is broken.  to remove gaim it will remove nautilus AND ubuntu desktop.  what do i do?
and m0u5e: ok i will do.
reistall after nautillus
reinstall WHAT?
what's the command line for reinstall?
how will i get my ubuntu desktop back?
do it
ok, it's done. removed gaim, nautilus-sendto, and ubuntu desktop
now what?
this what it says when i try to install nautilus: Reading package lists... Done
doesn't that mean that it WONT install nautilus?
you HAVE nautillus already
thanks, i think :)
